MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Tudweiliog, Dinas and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 5:16 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17 am on 16th March, 2021.
